price: Dhugumatti, Nutis waan isaaniif waadaa galle si argisiisuu irratti danda’oodha
arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمۡ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā ʿalā an nuriyaka mā naʿiduhum laqādirūna
